title: Sheryl Sandberg: Facebook to support small businesses through coronavirus crisis with $100 million i
text: Facebook Chief Operating Officer Sheryl Sandberg explains the internet giant's pledge to help 30,000 businesses worldwide stay above water through the coronavirus outbreak.

title: Sheryl Sandberg says Facebook wants to help small businesses pay workers and move online amid COVID-19 crisis
text: Sandberg said on Tuesday that Facebook will do what it can to help its employees and small businesses manage through the coronavirus outbreak.

title: Researchers Encouraged to Use Artificial Intelligence to Analyze Coronavirus
text: Governments are helping scientists employ AI to comb through coronavirus research.

title: Google, Facebook could help US track spread of coronavirus with phone location data
text: The companies have reportedly been in talks with the US government over using anonymous and aggregated data.

title: Facebook is giving $1,000 to all of its 45,000 employees
text: Facebook is giving each of its employees a $1,000 bonus to help support them during the coronavirus outbreak.

title: Facebook Will Give Employees $1,000 Bonuses to Support Remote Work
text: The social network giant also announced a $100 million program to help small businesses impacted by the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Facebook Giving $1,000 Bonus To Employees To Support Work From Home
text:
Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg, in an email sent to employees Tuesday, said they will receive a $1,000 bonus to help them make the shift to working remotely during the coronavirus pandemic.

title: The Ratings Game: Here are the new ‘best ideas’ stocks at Wedbush during COVID-19 pandemic
text: Wedbush analysts added four stocks to its “best ideas list,” as those companies are among those believed to be best positioned to weather the storm as the COVID-19 pandemic leads to changes in consumer behavior and raises the risk of a recession.

text: Grants and ad credits will be available to tens of thousands of small businesses around the world trying to stay afloat amid the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Facebook announces $100M grant program for small businesses
text: Regardless of how COVID-19 pandemic plays out in the coming weeks and months, it’s already been brutal for small businesses, with some of them forced close for public safety, while others are taking a big hit in both revenue and access to credit . So Facebook announced today that it’s creating a $100 million grant […]

title: Facebook to pay employees $1,000 bonuses to assist during coronavirus outbreak
text: CNBC's Julia Boorstin reports that Facebook will give its workers cash to deal with virus outbreak.

title: Facebook to give $1,000 bonuses to each of its employees to deal with coronavirus fallout
text: Facebook on Tuesday told employees that it would give each of them $1,000 bonuses in an effort to support its workforce working remotely as they wait out the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Facebook to award $100 mln in cash grants, ad credits to small businesses
text: Facebook Inc said Tuesday it plans to award $100 million in cash grants and ad credits for up to 30,000 small businesses in over 30 countries to address the economic impact of the  coronavirus outbreak.

title: Facebook offers financial aid to employees and small businesses
text: Facebook Inc. has undertaken two major business initiatives to help two of its most important constituents: Employees and small businesses.

title: Facebook, Microsoft, Twitter, and Google to Fight Coronavirus Misinformation Together
text: The big tech companies have a shot at doing good for society by curbing the flow of misinformation on their platforms. They are now joining forces in the effort.

text: "We want to do our part," COO Sheryl Sandberg wrote in a post announcing the initiative.

title: Facebook announces $100 million program for small businesses impacted by coronavirus

title: Facebook to award $100 million in grants, ad credits to small businesses
text: Facebook Inc said Tuesday it plans to award $100 million in cash grants and ad credits for up to 30,000 small businesses in over 30 countries to address the economic impact of the coronavirus outbreak.

title: Facebook to offer $100 million in cash grants, ad credits to small businesses due to coronavirus
text: Facebook Inc. FB, -1.49% announced Tuesday that it was launching a program that would provide $100 million in cash grants and advertising credits to small businesses coping with economic uncertainty due to the outbreak of COVID-19, the disease brought on by the novel coronavirus.

title: Sports Are Cancelled. Where Will All the Ad Spending Go?
text: Sports bring in billions in ad revenue, but not if there aren't any games to broadcast.

title: Facebook, Twitter, Google and other tech giants join forces to fight coronavirus fake news
text: Technology giants including Facebook, Twitter, Google GOOG, -11.10%  and YouTube have joined forces to fight fraud and misinformation over the coronavirus pandemic and push official guidance on their platforms.
